text.author: Wikivoyage community (see URL)
text.title: Fort Walton Beach
text.p:
Fort Walton
Beach
is a small city in
Emerald Coast
region of
Florida
, forty miles east of
Pensacola
.

list.item:
Destin – Fort Walton Beach Airport
( VPS ) .
Serves Fort Walton Beach and nearby
Valparaiso
.
American Eagle , Delta Air Lines , Delta Connection , United Express serve the airport .

p.s:
US 98 connects Fort Walton Beach with
Pensacola
and
Panama City
.

It also connects with nearby
Destin
.
Florida 85 connects the area with I-10 .
Fort Walton Beach has two main arterials .

The
Miracle Strip Parkway
( US 98 ) travels along the seacoast and through Eglin Air Force Base , and the
Eglin Parkway
( Florida SR 85 ) links the city with Okaloosa Regional Airport .

list.item:
The Gulfarium
, 1010 Miracle Strip Parkway , ☏ +1 850-243-9046 , toll-free : +1-800-247-8575 .
Admissions are open from 9AM until 4PM .
Park closes at 6PM .

Indian Temple Mound and Museum
, 139 Miracle Strip Pkwy SE .
Aug-May M - F 10AM-4:30PM ; Jun-Jul M - Sa 10AM-4:30PM , Su noon-4:30PM .

Air Armament Museum
, 100 Museum Dr ( Eglin Air Force Base ) , ☏ +1850 882-4062 .
M - Sa 9:30AM-4:30PM. .
Free .
Visit the beach .

Billy Bowlegs Festival
, pirate themed street party early each June .
Antique stores and shops along Highway 98 / Miracle Strip Parkway across from the Indian Temple Mound .

p.s: Ft. Walton Beach has many restaurants , including :

list.item:
Anglers
by the base of the pier on Okaloosa Island

The Breakfast Club
.

Fish Lipz
, 203 Brooks St ( off Highway 98 by the bridge to Okaloosa Island ) , ☏ +1850 226-7123 .
Waterfront views , good food and drink .
Often have small live bands in the evenings .

Fudpuckers
.

Manhattan Pizza
.

Taj Mahal
, 217 Miracle Strip Parkway , ☏ +1850 243-1648 .
Southwest .
Indian food .
The tasty food and entertaining belly-dancer compensate for rather indifferent and amateurish wait staff .

Fish Lipz
, listed at " Eat " above

America 's Best Inn
, 100 S.W. Miracle Strip Pkwy , ☏ +1850 244-0121 , fax : +1850 244-1094 .

Best Western Ft. Walton Beachfront Hotel
, 380 Santa Rosa Boulevard , ☏ +1850 243-9444 , toll-free : +1-877-243-9444 , fax : +1850 243-5445 .

Holiday Inn SunSpree Resort
, 573 Santa Rosa Blvd , ☏ +1850 244-8686 .

Econo Lodge
.

Hampton Inn
.

Radisson Inn
.

The Ramada Plaza Beach Resort
, 1500
Miracle Strip Parkway , ☏ +1850 243-9161 .

Super 8
Miracle Strip Parkway .
Some rooms with jacuzzi tubs .

Destin
is just to the east on the other side of Okaloosa Island .

Pensacola
is about half an hour to the west .
